channel.title: Fml
channel.description:
ive been trying for 2 days now to get my server online and the closest i have came so far is player connects...then my net dc im not sure but i think it is something to do with either the server.java or maybe portforwarding/ip problem?
i have a no-ip done everything any guide has told me to do CORRECTLY even try using untorrent and added the auto-portforward thing and it says [code=java][12/15/10 1:54 AM]: Launching TAINTED-PKZ.. [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: Automatically port forwarding... [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: Could not automatically port forward, stacktrace: [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: at org.allgofree.upnp.UpnpPortForwarder.getGateway(UpnpPortForwarder.java:48) [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: at org.allgofree.upnp.UpnpPortForwarder.addMapping(UpnpPortForwarder.java:30) [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:102) [12/15/10 1:54 AM]: Server listening on port : 43594[/code]
im so lost and EXTREMELY eager to get this thing running please help me!

ive been trying for 2 days now to get my server online and the closest i have came so far is player connects…then my net dc im not sure but i think it is something to do with either the server.java or maybe portforwarding/ip problem?
